item.description:
Snow Tubing with lots of Hot Chocolate & whip cream !

We will meet up there at 845 - FYI It's about a 90 minute drive from Wareham. The lines are smaller in the morning and the ride is faster.

Tubing will commence at 9 am and end at 12. Where we will then adjourn to the parking lot for some Tubin' Tailgatin" Please bring your own lunch ! A table and hot chocolate will be provided.

Group rates - If we get 15 or more people we can get the group rate which is $23 for two hours of tubing - $25 for 3 hours.. Otherwise its a little more...

in order to get the Group Rates we have to purchase the tickets at the same time - so please don't be late.

I will send out my phone number a few days before (if I forget, someone remind me) that or just click on the Blue Moon link to the left - that's me !

FYI - the Tubing park is not in the same area as the ski resort. So go to the address listed above. Someone will mess this up I promise - and when they do, they will have to wear the "hat of shame" all day.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the parking lot at 845 - look for my Blue Toyota Sienna Mini-van and if its not too windy my blue 10x10 canopy

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Snow Tubing @ Nashoba Valley - Kid Friendly
